abstract: kourtney kardashian explains why kylie jenner 's not in the most recent family pic .
article: say what you will about the karjenner sisters , these girls have a sense of humor . kendall jenner , for one , had an epic response for fans speculating whether or not she might be preggers over the weekend , and now , kourtney kardashian is here with a wisecrack of her own about the whereabouts of one * particular * sister in the family 's latest group shot . the eldest kardashian sibling took to instagram last night to post a snap of herself , daughter penelope , khloé , kim , north , kendall , and kris dressed up in their holiday finest .

fans were not remiss to the fact that every karjenner sister was pictured ... except for one . the same one , in fact , that was also missing from the family 's official christmas card , much to the dismay of , well , everyone : kylie jenner . lest her page be flooded with comments demanding answers , kourtney took a proactive approach , addressing her family member 's absence in the caption . `` when you ca n't find the rest of the family for a photo ... '' she joked . adding to the humor was khloé kardashian , who took it upon herself to answer the * other * question on everyone 's mind : why the heck was no one smiling ?

`` all i wanted was the food , '' she explained . `` lol i was mad everyone was eating and i had to stand there and wait for everyone . '' if these two are to be believed , it sounds like there 's no kylie conspiracy at all -- just a case of a momma-to-be looking to get her grub on , and quick ! with others speculating that the entrepreneur has actually already given birth , we do n't know what to think anymore . all we can say is touché , kardashians . touché . why do you think kylie was missing from the photo ?
